allow:
Bash(git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "$\(cat <<'EOF'
Add CHANGELOG.md with full version history from v0.0.1 to v0.3.3

Documents every commit with what changed, why, and system impact.
Covers Phase 1 scaffold through Phase 3C base_agent rewrite.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)" && git push origin main)
